response:
"wie kann man noch immer davon sprechen, dass die menschen ihre persönlichen informationen schützen sollten, wenn die meisten von uns permanent online sind und unsere daten von unternehmen und regierungen gesammelt werden? es ist wie ein widerspruch in sich. #datenschutz #privatsphäre"

translation: "how can we still talk about protecting personal information when most of us are permanently online and our data is being collected by companies and governments? it's a contradiction in itself. #dataprotection #privacy"

this post critiques the idea that individuals can still control their personal information in today's digital age. the user questions the effectiveness of data protection measures when most people are constantly connected to the internet and their personal data is being collected by various entities. the hashtags #datenschutz (data protection) and #privatsphäre (privacy) are used to reach a wider audience and to connect the post to ongoing conversations around these topics.
